entry.title: New release for Budibase: 3.12.14
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • [Added] Actions tracking by @jvcalderon in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/16334
  • Filtered publishing (feature flagged behind workspace apps) by @mike12345567 in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/16306
  • Label public API search request body as not required, because it isn't. by @samwho in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/16337
  • PublishModal empty state improvements by @mike12345567 in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/16340
  • Improvements to Publish Modal design by @mike12345567 in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/16345
  • Changed screen navigation logo position based on feedback. by @ConorWebb96 in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/16356
  • Internal urls for api calls to account-portal by @calexiou in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/16344
  • [BUDI-9039] Fix conditional formatting refresh for external tables. by @samwho in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/16313
  • [BUDI-9220] Allow uploading attachments to anyone with table write permissions, not just creators. by @samwho in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/16347
  • Fixes on migration processor by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/16350
  • Rename workspace app url by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/16351
  • [BUDI-9202] Fix table ID parsing in so that it works with sample tables by @samwho in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/16346
  • Add missing displayName to datasource plugin schema by @CSLTech in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/16343
  • Default to ACCOUNT_PORTAL_URL if internal is not set by @calexiou in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/16366
  • Default to public URL to address typing issue by @calexiou in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/16369
  • Set maximum number of active sessions per user to 3 (from 1) by @samwho in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/16323
  • Add DataDog instrumentation to Google Sheets reads. by @samwho in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/16363
  • Fix unhandled promise rejection in utils.parallelForeach by @samwho in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/16362
  • streaming support for agents by @shogunpurple in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/16300
  • Agent UI tweaks by @aptkingston in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/16342
  • Database find function by @mike12345567 in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/16370

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/compare/3.12.13...3.12.14
